title: Snapshot generation ETA increases
body:
#### System information

Geth version: `1.10.26`
CL client & version: nimbus@v22.12.0
OS & Version: Ubuntu 20.04LTS

#### Expected behaviour

Generate snapshot by providing an ETA

#### Actual behaviour

ETA seems to increase for ever

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour

Validator crashed unexpectedly a few days ago so geth was not shutdown gracefully. After rebooting I let it run and synchronize again, it took a day to sync back. However, I get the following "state snapshot generation" messages in the log, and the ETA increases instead of decreases. Also after Jan 8 (see logs below) I do not get the "Aborting state snapshot generation" messages, only the "Resuming" ones, not sure if this is normal as well and if this is related to the ETA issue.

#### Backtrace

````
Jan 08 12:30:27 validator geth[924]: INFO [01-08|12:30:27.594] Resuming state snapshot generation       root=ef4fc9..28dce2 in=008f65..483efb at=51a3a9..a4c55d accounts=427,015          slots=3,979,048           storage=338.41MiB dangling=0 elapsed=3m27.852s     eta=26h19m45.836s
...
Jan 08 12:46:42 validator geth[924]: INFO [01-08|12:46:42.282] Resuming state snapshot generation       root=599008..337f01 in=053a16..4b4ee8 at=6f0107..51c7ef accounts=3,990,656        slots=18,623,220          storage=1.61GiB    dangling=0 elapsed=19m42.540s    eta=15h45m35.231s
...
Jan 08 13:33:36 validator geth[924]: INFO [01-08|13:33:36.166] Resuming state snapshot generation       root=223464..0f8db2 at=0f2500..720d36 accounts=11,564,197       slots=60,861,507          storage=4.97GiB    dangling=0 elapsed=1h6m36.424s   eta=17h39m18.27s
...
Jan 08 20:37:02 validator geth[924]: INFO [01-08|20:37:02.086] Aborting state snapshot generation       root=bc6efd..150f43 in=5f04ce..72ad87 at=8d1321..9b4ec7 accounts=72,556,200       slots=346,101,394         storage=27.95GiB   dangling=0 elapsed=8h10m2.344s   eta=13h50m13.58s
Jan 08 20:37:02 validator geth[924]: INFO [01-08|20:37:02.096] Resuming state snapshot generation       root=36146f..0f25a1 in=5f04ce..72ad87 at=8d1321..9b4ec7 accounts=72,556,200       slots=346,101,394         storage=27.95GiB   dangling=0 elapsed=8h10m2.354s   eta=13h50m13.597s
Jan 08 20:37:10 validator geth[924]: INFO [01-08|20:37:10.108] Generating state snapshot                root=36146f..0f25a1 in=5f058b..cebcd2 at=3acba1..4c66d4 accounts=72,558,348       slots=346,134,797         storage=27.96GiB   dangling=0 elapsed=8h10m10.366s  eta=13h50m24.761s
...
Jan 09 11:29:48 validator geth[924]: INFO [01-09|11:29:48.308] Resuming state snapshot generation       root=bbf5c8..60a316 in=5f058b..cebcd2 at=e62276..fc68be accounts=72,558,348       slots=398,372,114         storage=31.48GiB   dangling=0 elapsed=23h2m48.566s  eta=39h2m38.907s
...
Jan 09 12:25:49 validator geth[924]: INFO [01-09|12:25:49.645] Resuming state snapshot generation       root=5ce895..205b55 in=5f058b..cebcd2 at=e62276..fc68be accounts=72,558,348       slots=399,232,881         storage=31.54GiB   dangling=0 elapsed=23h58m49.903s eta=40h37m33.423s
...
Jan 10 12:04:01 validator geth[924]: INFO [01-10|12:04:01.814] Resuming state snapshot generation       root=8264f6..4c598b in=5f058b..cebcd2 at=e62276..fc68be accounts=72,558,348       slots=420,855,034         storage=33.00GiB   dangling=0 elapsed=47h37m2.072s  eta=80h40m9.972s
...
Jan 10 19:33:24 validator geth[924]: INFO [01-10|19:33:24.216] Resuming state snapshot generation       root=7f723a..85065a in=5f058b..cebcd2 at=e62276..fc68be accounts=72,558,348       slots=427,734,646         storage=33.47GiB   dangling=0 elapsed=55h6m24.474s  eta=93h21m27.581s
...
Jan 11 11:29:49 validator geth[924]: INFO [01-11|11:29:49.713] Resuming state snapshot generation       root=62f72e..ce800f in=5f058b..cebcd2 at=e62276..fc68be accounts=72,558,348       slots=442,345,379         storage=34.45GiB   dangling=0 elapsed=71h2m49.971s  eta=120h21m45.637s
...
Jan 11 19:26:12 validator geth[924]: INFO [01-11|19:26:12.943] Resuming state snapshot generation       root=d2f406..dd7739 in=5f058b..cebcd2 at=e62276..fc68be accounts=72,558,348       slots=449,581,575         storage=34.94GiB   dangling=0 elapsed=78h59m13.201s eta=133h48m49.127s
...
Jan 12 13:51:12 validator geth[924]: INFO [01-12|13:51:12.843] Resuming state snapshot generation       root=bd8caa..16b860 in=5f058b..cebcd2 at=e62276..fc68be accounts=72,558,348       slots=466,482,949         storage=36.09GiB   dangling=0 elapsed=97h24m13.101s eta=165h0m49.272s
````

Following up on the issue, I still get the "Resuming state snapshot generation" messages after more than a week without any "Aborting" ones. As you see, the `accounts=72,558,348` does not change, and the  `slots`, `storage` and `eta` continue increasing.

```
Jan 17 14:10:00 validator geth[924]: INFO [01-17|14:10:00.748] Resuming state snapshot generation       root=dbdd16..d7fa75 in=5f058b..cebcd2 at=e62276..fc68be accounts=72,558,348       slots=576,838,441         storage=43.54GiB   dangling=0 elapsed=217h43m1.006s  eta=368h50m20.955s
Jan 17 14:10:00 validator geth[924]: INFO [01-17|14:10:00.827] Imported new potential chain segment     blocks=1    txs=92        mgas=5.584  elapsed=601.994ms      mgasps=9.276   number=16,427,028 hash=dc78ad..a08f67 dirty=509.10MiB
Jan 17 14:10:01 validator geth[924]: INFO [01-17|14:10:01.680] Chain head was updated                   number=16,427,028 hash=dc78ad..a08f67 root=1c9aae..23f469 elapsed=9.151929ms
Jan 17 14:10:01 validator geth[924]: INFO [01-17|14:10:01.693] Unindexed transactions                   blocks=1    txs=348       tail=14,077,029 elapsed=11.441ms
Jan 17 14:10:01 validator geth[924]: WARN [01-17|14:10:01.706] Ignoring already known beacon payload    number=16,427,028 hash=dc78ad..a08f67 age=2s
Jan 17 14:10:01 validator geth[924]: WARN [01-17|14:10:01.794] Ignoring already known beacon payload    number=16,427,028 hash=dc78ad..a08f67 age=2s
Jan 17 14:10:14 validator geth[924]: INFO [01-17|14:10:14.512] Resuming state snapshot generation       root=d046ef..3dc6da in=5f058b..cebcd2 at=e62276..fc68be accounts=72,558,348       slots=576,841,519         storage=43.54GiB   dangling=0 elapsed=217h43m14.770s eta=368h50m44.273s
Jan 17 14:10:14 validator geth[924]: INFO [01-17|14:10:14.617] Imported new potential chain segment     blocks=1    txs=349       mgas=25.023 elapsed=872.585ms      mgasps=28.677  number=16,427,029 hash=0ec24e..d4a414 dirty=510.72MiB
Jan 17 14:10:15 validator geth[924]: INFO [01-17|14:10:15.524] Chain head was updated                   number=16,427,029 hash=0ec24e..d4a414 root=ede1ab..becdab elapsed=39.233194ms
Jan 17 14:10:15 validator geth[924]: INFO [01-17|14:10:15.543] Unindexed transactions                   blocks=1    txs=211       tail=14,077,030 elapsed=18.259ms
Jan 17 14:10:24 validator geth[924]: INFO [01-17|14:10:24.695] Resuming state snapshot generation       root=f58fc3..8e12f0 in=5f058b..cebcd2 at=e62276..fc68be accounts=72,558,348       slots=576,844,597         storage=43.54GiB   dangling=0 elapsed=217h43m24.953s eta=368h51m1.524s
```

Eventually this behavior resulted in "bad block" messages and the database being unrecoverable. Had to removedb and sync from scratch.
```
Jan 19 23:14:26 validator geth[924]: INFO [01-19|23:14:26.704] Chain head was updated                   number=16,444,061 hash=499cd3..e9509b root=70a824..a8c473 elapsed=15.05104>
Jan 19 23:14:26 validator geth[924]: INFO [01-19|23:14:26.714] Unindexed transactions                   blocks=1    txs=183       tail=14,094,062 elapsed=9.771ms
Jan 19 23:14:26 validator geth[924]: WARN [01-19|23:14:26.775] Ignoring already known beacon payload    number=16,444,061 hash=499cd3..e9509b age=3s
Jan 19 23:14:27 validator geth[924]: WARN [01-19|23:14:27.228] Ignoring already known beacon payload    number=16,444,061 hash=499cd3..e9509b age=4s
Jan 19 23:14:27 validator geth[924]: WARN [01-19|23:14:27.552] Ignoring already known beacon payload    number=16,444,061 hash=499cd3..e9509b age=4s
Jan 19 23:14:37 validator geth[924]: ERROR[01-19|23:14:37.088]
Jan 19 23:14:37 validator geth[924]: ########## BAD BLOCK #########
...
Jan 19 23:14:37 validator geth[924]:          95: cumulative: 9917720 gas: 21000 contract: 0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000 status: 1 tx: 0xf90fc8f237d3cebced904b537d54>
Jan 19 23:14:37 validator geth[924]: Error: invalid gas used (remote: 9915720 local: 9917720)
Jan 19 23:14:37 validator geth[924]: ##############################
Jan 19 23:14:37 validator geth[924]:  
Jan 19 23:14:37 validator geth[924]: WARN [01-19|23:14:37.089] NewPayloadV1: inserting block failed     error="invalid gas used (remote: 9915720 local: 9917720)"
Jan 19 23:19:49 validator geth[924]: WARN [01-19|23:19:49.619] Ignoring payload with missing parent     number=16,444,088 hash=a1420a..6642fd parent=e6b12f..c78923
Jan 19 23:20:20 validator geth[924]: WARN [01-19|23:20:20.149] Beacon client online, but no consensus updates received in a while. Please fix your beacon client to follow the cha>
Jan 19 23:20:59 validator geth[924]: WARN [01-19|23:20:59.830] Ignoring already known beacon payload    number=16,444,061 hash=499cd3..e9509b age=6m36s
Jan 19 23:20:59 validator geth[924]: WARN [01-19|23:20:59.943] Marked new chain head as invalid         hash=0fe99a..4b9454 badnumber=16,444,062 badhash=ae1817..f82439
...
Jan 19 23:21:20 validator geth[924]: WARN [01-19|23:21:20.677] Too many bad block import attempt, trying number=16,444,062 hash=ae1817..f82439
Jan 19 23:21:20 validator geth[924]: INFO [01-19|23:21:20.885] Skip duplicated bad block                number=16,444,062 hash=ae1817..f82439
Jan 19 23:21:20 validator geth[924]: ERROR[01-19|23:21:20.893]
Jan 19 23:21:20 validator geth[924]: ########## BAD BLOCK #########
Jan 19 23:21:20 validator geth[924]: Chain config: Chain ID:  1 (mainnet)
```

Hi, i have the same problem after activating the snapshots.

I also saw that the ETA increased instead of decreasing.

Geth v1.11.1 (Pebble) 


Thanks.


